content.content:
`.customers`

Use the **customers** resource to create, read, update and delete end users in
a merchant's store, you can edit all customer properties and also work with all
customer subresources directly at this resource

meta.description: Whether customer was registered by staff and is trusted
The state of registration, if completed, invited and waiting, or declined by customer
Whether customer account is enabled to make orders
Whether the customer can sign in to the store with this account
Status defined by seller, such as active or blocked - Max length: **50**
ID of customer who invited this new customer, if he was invited by another account - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
UTM campaign HTTP parameters associated with this customer's first access
Parameter "`utm_source`", the referrer: (e.g. google, newsletter) - Max length: **100**
Parameter "`utm_medium`", the marketing medium: (e.g. cpc, banner, email) - Max length: **100**
Parameter "`utm_campaign`", the product, promo code, or slogan (e.g. `spring_sale`) - Max length: **200**
Parameter "`utm_term`", identifies the paid keywords - Max length: **100**
Parameter "`utm_content`", used to differentiate ads - Max length: **255**
Providers for OAuth authentication - Max elements: **20**
Unique ID (ObjectID) - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
The provider with which the user authenticated, eg.: facebook - Max length: **30**
Unique ID for the user generated by the service provider - Max length: **255**
Customer language two letters code, sometimes with region, eg.: `pt_br`, fr, `en_us` - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z]{2}(_[a-z]{2})?$`**
Customer main email address - Max length: **200** - Format: **email**
List of customer email addresses - Max elements: **20**
The actual email address - Max length: **200** - Format: **email**
The type of email
States whether or not the email address has been verified
Indicates whether customer would like to receive email updates from the shop
The name of this Customer, suitable for display - Max length: **50**
Customer name object
The family name of this user, or "last name" - Max length: **70**
The "first name" of this user - Max length: **70**
The middle name(s) of this user - Max length: **255**
Date of customer birth
Day of birth
Number of month of birth
Year of birth
Customer gender, female, male or third gender (X)
User profile pictures - Max elements: **20**
Image URL
List of customer phone numbers - Max elements: **20**
Country calling code (without `+`), defined by standards E.123 and E.164
The actual phone number, digits only - Max length: **19** - RegEx pattern: **`^[0-9]+$`**
The type of phone
Physical or juridical (company) person
Country of document origin, an ISO 3166-2 code - Min length: **2** - Max length: **2** - RegEx pattern: **`^[A-Z]+$`**
Responsible person or organization document number (only numbers) - Max length: **19** - RegEx pattern: **`^[0-9]+$`**
Municipal or state registration if exists
Municipal or state registration number (with characters) if exists - Max length: **50**
Registered company name or responsible fullname - Max length: **255**
List of customer addresses - Max elements: **40**
Unique ID (ObjectID) - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
ZIP (CEP, postal...) code - Max length: **30**
Street or public place name - Max length: **200**
House or building street number
Address complement or second line, such as apartment number - Max length: **100**
Borough name - Max length: **100**
Some optional other reference for this address - Max length: **100**
Full in line mailing address, should include street, number and borough - Max length: **255**
City name - Max length: **100**
Country name - Max length: **50**
An ISO 3166-2 country code - Min length: **2** - Max length: **2** - RegEx pattern: **`^[A-Z]+$`**
Province or state name - Max length: **100**
The two-letter code for the province or state - Min length: **2** - Max length: **2** - RegEx pattern: **`^[A-Z]+$`**
The name of recipient, generally is the customer's name - Max length: **70**
The recipient's last name - Max length: **70**
Customer phone number for this mailing address
Country calling code (without `+`), defined by standards E.123 and E.164
The actual phone number, digits only - Max length: **19** - RegEx pattern: **`^[0-9]+$`**
Indicates whether this address is the default address for the customer
Lists (collections) of products recommended by seller to this customer - Max elements: **20**
Unique ID (ObjectID) - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
Collection title - Max length: **50**
List of products - Max elements: **100**
Product ID
Tag to identify object, use only lowercase letters, digits and underscore - Max length: **20** - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9_]+$`**
Lists (collections) of products selected by the customer - Max elements: **20**
Unique ID (ObjectID) - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
Collection title - Max length: **50**
List of products - Max elements: **300**
Product ID
Tag to identify object, use only lowercase letters, digits and underscore - Max length: **20** - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9_]+$`**
Products recommended by artificial intelligence (machine learning) - Max elements: **100**
Product ID
Products marked as favorites - Max elements: **3000**
Product ID
Products added to customer's gift list - Max elements: **3000**
Product ID - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
Whether the gift is waiting to buyer or has already been purchased
Flags to associate additional info - Max elements: **10**
Flag title
Informations about this customer gifts list
Title for the gifts list, generally defined by the customer - Max length: **100**
Short text description for the gifts list - Max length: **255**
URL to gifts list page - Max length: **255** - Format: **uri**
Date and time of the event in ISO 8601 standard representation - Format: **date-time**
Validity of the list, until this date the gifts can be bought - Format: **date-time**
Authors of the list, if it is a wedding list, the names of the bride and groom - Max elements: **10**
Author name
Email address to be notified after gift purchase - Max length: **200** - Format: **email**
Email address or phone number to contact list owners - Max length: **200**
Last products visited by the customer - Max elements: **20**
Product ID
Last terms searched on shop by the customer - Max elements: **20**
Term
Items purchased with this account, on all saved (not necessarily paid) orders - Max elements: **3000**
Product ID
Default discount exclusively for this customer
In which value the discount will be applied at checkout
Discount type
Discount value, percentage or fixed - Mininum: **-99999999** - Maximum: **99999999**
Whether the customer should be charged taxes when placing orders
Default currency for the user, designator according to ISO 4217 (3 uppercase letters) - RegEx pattern: **`^[A-Z]{3}$`**
Graphic symbol used as a shorthand for currency's name - Max length: **20**
Total number of orders completed by this customer
The total amount in orders completed by this customer - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **999999999999**
Loyalty points programs, `program_id` as property name - Max properties: **100**
Loyalty points program object, specify how many points the customer have
The name of the loyalty points program - Max length: **50**
Number of accumulated loyalty points - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **999999999**
Code to identify the affiliate that referred the customer - Max length: **200**
The total amount of money that this customer has spent at the store - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **999999999999**
The total amount in cancelled orders - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **999999999999**
List of customer orders - Max elements: **1000**
Order ID - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
When order was saved, date and time in ISO 8601 standard representation - Format: **date-time**
Auto incremented order number
Designator of currency according to ISO 4217 (3 uppercase letters) - RegEx pattern: **`^[A-Z]{3}$`**
Graphic symbol used as a shorthand for currency's name - Max length: **20**
Object with sums of values
Order total amount - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **9999999999**
The sum of all items prices - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **9999999999**
Order freight cost - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **9999999999**
Applied discount value - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **9999999999**
The sum of all the taxes applied to the order - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **9999999999**
Sum of optional extra costs applied - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **9999999999**
Name or summary of order payment method(s) - Max length: **100**
Name of order shipping method(s) - Max length: **100**
List of customer saved credit cards - Max elements: **40**
Unique ID (ObjectID) - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
Full name of the holder, as it is on the credit card - Max length: **100**
Issuer identification number (IIN), known as bank identification number (BIN)
Credit card issuer name, eg.: Visa, American Express, MasterCard - Max length: **100**
Last digits (up to 4) of credit card number - Max length: **4** - RegEx pattern: **`^[0-9]+$`**
Unique credit card token - Max length: **255**
Payment intermediator
Gateway name standardized as identification code - Min length: **6** - Max length: **70** - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9_]+$`**
ID of respective customer account in the intermediator - Max length: **255**
List of custom attributes - Max elements: **100**
Unique ID (ObjectID) - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
String to help distinguish who (or which app) created and can use the metafield - Max length: **30**
Field name - Max length: **50**
Custom property value - Max length: **255**
List of custom attributes - Max elements: **100**
Unique ID (ObjectID) - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
String to help distinguish who (or which app) created and can use the metafield - Max length: **30**
Field name - Max length: **50**
Custom property value - Max length: **255**
Flags to associate additional info - Max elements: **10**
Flag title
Optional notes with additional info about this customer - Max length: **255**
Description and notes about this customer, available only for shop administrators - Max length: **255**

content.content:
*/customers.json?limit&offset&sort&fields\&[field]* > Authentication
_GET_: **required** Use [default URL parameters](#introduction/overview/url-params) (metadata) for pagination and ordering, you can use any other parameter to query by particular object properties

{
  "meta": {
    "limit": 1000,
    "offset": 0,
    "sort": [],
    "fields": [
      "_id",
      "state",
      "enabled",
      "login",
      "status",
      "main_email",
      "display_name"
    ],
    "query": {}
  },
  "result": [
    {
      "_id": "3c1000000000000000000001",
      "state": "registered",
      "enabled": true,
      "login": true,
      "status": "active",
      "main_email": "123@mail.com",
      "display_name": "Fulano"
    },
    {
      "_id": "3c1000000000000000000002",
      "state": "registered",
      "enabled": true,
      "login": true,
      "status": "active",
      "main_email": "johndoe@mail.com",
      "display_name": "John"
    },
    {
      "_id": "3c1000000000000000000003",
      "state": "registered",
      "enabled": true,
      "login": true,
      "main_email": "mail@sample.ex",
      "display_name": "Jane"
    },
    {
      "_id": "3c1000000000000000000004",
      "state": "registered",
      "enabled": false,
      "login": false,
      "status": "untrusted",
      "main_email": "456@mail.com",
      "display_name": "Richard"
    },
    {
      "_id": "3c1000000000000000000005",
      "state": "registered",
      "enabled": true,
      "login": true,
      "status": "star",
      "main_email": "janerue@mail.ex",
      "display_name": "Jane Rue"
    },
    {
      "_id": "3c1000000000000000000006",
      "state": "registered",
      "enabled": true,
      "login": false,
      "status": "buy_only",
      "main_email": "abc@mail.com",
      "display_name": "Name"
    }
  ]
}

meta.description: Max number of objects to return
meta.title: number

meta.description: First entry to return
meta.title: number

meta.description: Rules to order resultant objects
meta.title: string

meta.description: Object properties to return
meta.title: string

meta.description: Object property to query
meta.title: string

content.content:
*/customers.json* > Authentication
_POST_: **required** Request body must obey the specifications of [this model](#reference/customers/customer-object) The properties `orders_count`, `orders_total_value`, `total_spent`, `total_cancelled` and `orders` will be filled automatically (except if disabled by merchant), but you can also preset these values if you want to

*/customers/[_id].json* > Authentication
_GET_: **optional**
_PATCH_, _PUT_, _DELETE_: **required** In read requests, response body will follow [this model](#reference/customers/customer-object), requests without authentication will receive customer data without `main_email`, `emails`, `name`, `photos`, `phones`, `doc_number`, `inscription_number`, `corporate_name`, `addresses`, `hidden_metafields` and `staff_notes` properties For overwriting and editing, request body must obey the same specifications, but especially for edit requests there are no required fields

meta.description: The customer ID
meta.title: string

meta.description: The customer ID
meta.title: string
